translations: n.普拉（博茨瓦纳的基本货币单位）

phrs.translation: 菲律宾文, 克罗地亚, 集区, 居住城市

sentences.sentence: Flashes of lighting cut through clouds in the sky over Pula, Croatia on Friday, July 10, 2009.
sentences.translation: 闪烁的灯光穿过云层上空普拉，克罗地亚星期五，2009年7月10号。

sentences.sentence: The low temperature dyeing of cashmere is carried out with Pula dyestuff, all dyeing-fastness in light-color and middle-color reached excellent grade, therefore the use performance …
sentences.translation: 普拉染料对羊绒进行低温染色，在浅色和中色各项染色牢度均能达到优等品指标，从而可提高产品的服用性能，并具有节能效果。
